name: Leafeon
description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

attacks.name: Miasma Wind
attacks.effect: Does 50 damage times the number of Special Conditions affecting the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Soothing Scent
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
